verbose_text: This result is consistent with several previous observations : that synaptotagmins couple to AP2 / clathrin, that endocytosis at the Drosophila neuromuscular junction is suppressed by light inactivation of synaptotagmin and that endocytosis at the calyx of Held is blocked by AP2 peptides.
evidence: AP2/clathrin              , that endocytosis at the Drosophila neuromuscular junction is suppressed
